SCALE_MODIFIERS.name: Daycare
SCALE_MODIFIERS.description: Makes mobs in the vault Babies

SCALE_MODIFIERS.name: Giant
SCALE_MODIFIERS.description: Makes mobs in the vault Giants

FRENZY_MODIFIERS.name: Frenzy
FRENZY_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs deal 3x damage, +10% movement speed and have only 1 health

FRENZY_MODIFIERS.name: Furious
FRENZY_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs deal +50% damage in this vault.

FRENZY_MODIFIERS.name: Raging
FRENZY_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs deal +100% damage in this vault.

FRENZY_MODIFIERS.name: Evul
FRENZY_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs deal +200% damage in this vault.

TRAPPED_CHESTS_MODIFIERS.name: Trapped
TRAPPED_CHESTS_MODIFIERS.description: Increases the chance of trapped chests by 3

INV_RESTORE_MODIFIERS.name: Phoenix
INV_RESTORE_MODIFIERS.description: All items you entered with will be restored on death

INV_RESTORE_MODIFIERS.name: Afterlife
INV_RESTORE_MODIFIERS.description: All items you entered with will be restored on death; No artifact can be found

CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.name: Poisonous
CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs have a chance of applying poison on hit

CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.name: Withering
CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs have a chance of applying withering on hit

CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.name: Fatiguing
CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs have a chance of applying mining fatigue on hit

CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.name: Freezing
CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.description: Mobs have a chance of applying slowness on hit

CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.name: Void Hex
CURSE_ON_HIT_MODIFIERS.description: Getting hit by mobs will rapidly decrease the vault timer
